attributes.action: Increase Driver CPC awareness and benefits
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to push the importance of the Driver CPC and strongly advise both bus / coach and lorry / truck companies and driver of the consequences of non-compliance.  They also need to better advise both these sectors of their responsibilities and of the outcomes and penalties of non-compliance. The deadline date(s) are getting ever closer but there are still a large number of operators who believe that the Government with perform a U turn on the deadline dates because of the potential chaos or are hoping that it will be scrapped.  It's importance needs to be pushed NOW!
